QuestData.Title: Rangari in the Red
QuestData.Description: Gorgrond is a very dangerous place and I've sent scouting squads out to investigate various regions.$b$bI've sent one squad to the marsh called the Crimson Fen and they've not come back yet. I'd like you to find the missing squad and get a report if possible.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Khaano near the Crimson Fen in Gorgrond.
QuestData.RewardText: D'kaan sent you? He's not likely to enjoy the report I have to give him.
